benchmark_details.name: Time Series Generation Conditioned on Unstructured Natural Language
benchmark_details.overview: The paper introduces a method for generating time series based on unstructured natural language descriptions and a novel dataset consisting of 63,010 time series-description pairs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To generate time series data conditioned on natural language descriptions using a diffusion model.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset may contain ambiguous descriptions, and the model has limitations in generating time series of varying lengths.

data.source: Constructed from various datasets including stock data, UCR Time Series Classification Archive, and synthetic data.
data.annotation: Descriptions generated using GPT-4o for the time series data.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated as pair-wise distances between generated time series and ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Lower distances indicate better alignment between generated time series and prompts.
methodology.validation: The model's performance is evaluated based on the quality of generated time series with various prompts.
